article.title: Origins of Scatter in the Relationship Between HCN 1-0 and Dense Gas Mass in the Galactic Center

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the top panel of Figure 1 show?
choices: A map of the integrated line luminosity of HNCO 404-303 in the Galactic center.
A map of the integrated line luminosity of HCN 1-0 in the Galactic center.
A map of the total column density of HCN in the Galactic center.
A map of the velocity dispersion of HCN 1-0 in the Galactic center.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the unit of the ratio shown in the color bars of Figure 2?
Which molecule shows the tightest linear correlation with cloud mass in Figure 3?
What causes the distinctive two-peaked morphology observed in the spectra of many transitions toward the core of Sgr B2 (Figure 4)?
choices: Different kinematic components along the line of sight.
Self-absorption by cooler or lower-excitation gas.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the variable Î¼H2 represent in Formula (1)?
choices: The mass of a hydrogen atom.
The mean molecular weight of the gas.
The column density of molecular hydrogen.
